original_title: しくじり新入社員と絶倫上司が出張先の相部屋ホテルで…朝から晩までひたすら浮気セックスに明け暮れてしまった一夜
overview: A fantastic performance by Kasui Jun. It’s the classic business trip plot done beautifully.  Hella sexy sex scenes too.
title: A clumsy rookie employee and an unparalleled boss in a shared hotel room on a business trip… cheating until morning
